trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Kent
There were no other sightings in Kent on or around September 4th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was getting out of my car after picking up some lunch, when i happend to look to the sky, and notice the object. I went into my girlfriend's house and immediately asked for her camera but unfortunately it would not focus on the object, she did however come out and witness the same thing that i saw. All I can say is that it looked like a star, but it was broad daylight High noon, but closer than a star like in our upper atmosphere, we watched for about ten minutes until a cloud passed in front of it and then it was gone. It didn't do anything fancy just kinda hovered there in the same spot, but literally disappeared from one minute to the next.
Summary: stagnent ball of light looked like a star but in broad daylight.
